description:
Case #0121102

Statement of Lesere Saraki, regarding a recent night-shift at St. Thomas Hospital, London .

…

Thanks again for everyone who has taken the time to subscribe and leave us a review. We have been enjoying our time on the front page of iTunes. And for anyone who hasn’t yet, please do take the time. We are a small, independent company and these recommendations are the best way to help us out.

As a thank you, for the duration of launch we will be releasing three episodes a week instead of our normal weekly release schedule. We hope you enjoy the extra terror…

Be sure to subscribe using your podcast software of choice to get every episode automatically downloaded to your device. Visit Rustyquill.com/subscribe for quick and easy links. It’s more convenient for you and really helps us out.

Like what you’re hearing? Let us know:

Tweet us at @theRustyQuill, drop us an email at mail@RustyQuill.com or comment on our dedicated Forums available at RustyQuill.com

For more information visit RustyQuill,com

Get bonus content on Patreon

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
